long_description: Perfect for day hikes or adventure races, the top-loading Osprey Talon 18 Pack offers a lightweight, ventilated harness and comfortable back panel in a technical and durable design. Lightweight Osprey AirScape(TM) back panel features molded foam ridges with air channels and a vertical "air chimney" covered in soft, airy mesh for ventilation and comfort. Mesh-covered, die-cut slotted foam BioStretch(TM) shoulder straps and hipbelt offer light and breathable comfort. Peripheral aluminum frame adds structure support and effectively shifts load weight to your hips. Top-loading main compartment holds lunch, an extra layer of clothes and tools. Hydration compartment opens between the torso adjustment and main pack compartment, making it easily accessible from the outside (reservoir sold separately). InsideOut(TM) compression straps can be routed inside or outside of the side pockets. The Osprey Talon 18 Pack features stretch-mesh hipbelt pockets, dual-entry stretch woven side pockets, fixed top pocket, under-lid mesh pocket and single ice-axe attachment.
short_description: Perfect for day hikes or adventure races, the top-loading Osprey Talon 18 Pack offers a lightweight, ventilated harness and comfortable back panel in a technical and durable design.
